name: Schmible
description:
Use your mouse to drag Schmibles on to each other to evolve, protect or sacrifice them!

==== PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING ====

Your objective is to keep the meter at the bottom of the screen from reaching to the max. You do that by sacrificing Schmibles that are LEVEL 3 or above. Schmibles are sacrificed when you fling them quickly across the screen and releasing your mouse.

Diseased schmibles are indicated by a green light which is also their spread radius. Anything beyond that radius is safe from being infected.

Try to reach for a high score!!
